alert.note: Alert for Cochise; Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 22 at 5:47PM MST until August 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of South Central Arizona and Southeast Arizona, including the following counties, in South Central Arizona, Pima. In Southeast Arizona, Cochise. * WHEN...Until 745 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 545 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms in northwest Cochise county, especially near Benson, Saint David and Mescal. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Benson, St. David, Kartchner Caverns State Park and Mescal. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
